llm_res.rule: name: Returns the name of the token - e.g. 'MyToken'. OPTIONAL - This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
decimals - Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
allowance - Returns the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.
The totalSupply function should return the actual total token supply without any manipulation or alteration.
